Body:
test_wing = PyVLM()
A = np.array([0, 0])
B = np.array([0, 1])
leading_edges_position = [A, B]
chord_length = [1, 1]
n, m = 1, 2
test_wing.add_wing(leading_edges_position, chord_length, n, m)
calculated_points = test_wing.Points
expected_points = [np.array([0, 0]), np.array([0, 0.5]), np.array([0, 1]),
    np.array([1, 0]), np.array([1, 0.5]), np.array([1, 1]), np.array([0, -1
    ]), np.array([0, -0.5]), np.array([0, 0]), np.array([1, -1]), np.array(
    [1, -0.5]), np.array([1, 0])]
assert_almost_equal(calculated_points, expected_points)
